title: How to promote my book without using conventional publishers - Quora

response.answer_text: Go to the places where people are interested in this subject matter, themes, and various sales handles of the book. If it’s a novel about the Wild West, go to gun shows, general stores in the settings of the book, and forums where the issues are discussed. Don’t just link the book and tell people to buy it. Become an active, contributing member of those communities. List in your bio that you have written this book or bring it up as it relates to the conversation. For starters, check these out: Social Media for Authors /Self-Promotion for Authors Good book marketing bares remarkable similarity to becoming enmeshed in a community and if you do it right, no one would ever use the word “marketing” to describe your behavior. Instead, they would think of you as “one of us.” Here’s some more related articles that should be helpful: Profit & Loss / Title Development / How to Pitch Your Book /Formatting for Print / The Economic Case for Traditional Format Offset Printing / Distribution Question (with infographic)/ Working with The Printer / Organizing a book tour / What a Publisher Does/ Paralleling the Dinosaurs /An overview

Quick answer, each step being available in detail elsewhere/ Edit or have edited your bookDecide if you want to produce ebooks, paper books or both.Produce or get produced a book cover.Produce or get produced the book description and keywords which readers would use to find itFormat your book content. Paper books will need this as a PDF file, ebooks will need a Word document.If producing an ebook, produce an EPUB copy using a program like ‘calibre’. Add the book description, keywords and cover at this stage.If making paper books use a print-on-demand service such as ‘CreateSpace’ for paperbacks or ‘Lulu’ for hardbacks.If this is your first ebook submit the EPUB to Amazon Kindle Direct Publishing and enrol it in Kindle Select. If you have other books DON’T use the Kindle Select option and submit it to other book distributors also.Publicise your book (The hardest bit which you should also have started at the same time as ‘1’.)
